name: Course on Isolation of Metals
description: In this course, Piyush Maheshwari will provide in-depth knowledge of Isolation of Metals. The course will be helpful for aspirants preparing for IIT JEE. Learners at any stage of their preparation will be benefited from the course. All doubts related to the topic will be clarified during the doubt clearing sessions in the course. Class dates and timings along with topic details are given below. The course will be covered in Hinglish and the notes will be provided in English.

value.title: Isolation of Metals - IV & Doubt Clearing Session
Isolation of Metals - VIII & Doubt Clearing Session

author.bio: A mentor to AIR 1, four 100 percentilers in JEE Mains and a guiding light to 10k+ IITians- all of these add to his exceptional achievements.
